title: GMWD Leverage Gym, Lever Gym with 2:1 Ratio LAT Low Row System, 2055LB Multi Bench Press Machine for Strength Training, Adjustable Full Body Workout Machine for Home Gym, Red
features: 【30-in-1 Home Gym Station】: Owning a GMWD LG01 gym station is like having multiple workout machines in a single: Lat pulldown station/2:1 ratio Low row station (includes footplate attachment)/Bicep curls machine/Upright rows machine/Bench press machine/ Squat Machine/ Shoulder press machine/Dips machine/Core trainer. Leverage gym equipment is a fantastic choice for building upper and lower body strength in your home gym.

【Compact & Cost Saving Choice】: With only a 23SQFT footprint you can have most of the features you might need in a home gym instead of 9 separate gym equipment. Designed with 2 weight plate storage horns holding up to 250 lbs. The perfect fit for your Home Gym or any commercial facility.

【Safety First】: Safety is always our priority, 2mm thick metal is ensuring stability and solid construction. We even used 5mm thick metal on some stress points. Also, we are offering aircraft-grade cables for our pulley system which could support you to a new weight level! The Lever arms have built-in safety stops that allow users to train to exhaustion without the use of a spotter. This security provides the opportunity to achieve maximum muscle growth in the comfort of your own home.

【2:1 Ratio】: GMWD LG01 provides a 2:1 ratio lat/low row system(Load capacity 280lbs) for heavier resistance, and it works great for 90% cable exercises. You will enjoy a full range of lat pull-downs. Leverage Gym is practical for your everyday needs!

【Versatile Design】Two Arms(each arm starting weight is12lbs) can be used with the connecting bar, which locks them together for Squats, deadlifts, shrugs, Calf Raises, and other basic compound movements or used without connecting bar for more isolated independent movements, such as alternate flat/incline/decline chest press, shoulder press and more. Also when locked together the arms form a great station for heavy dips. Feel free to explore more movements by yourself!

【Product Dimensions】GMWD leverage machine overall size:60”(W)×55”(L)×81”(H). Gross weight:207lbs. Each Lever Arm Starting Weight:23lbs. Connecting bar Starting Weight: 5.4lbs. Weight capacity:2055lbs. Recommended ceiling height: 81-87". We provide professional assemble tools and instructions, more efficient and easier.

description: Product DescriptionPerform a variety of upper, lower, and abdominal muscles for a total body work out with the Body-Solid Powerline Home Gym (PHG1000X). Perform such as exercises as lat pull downs, triceps press downs, ab crunches, leg curls, leg extensions, chest press, seated rows, cable curls, upright rows, and more at the 5 different stations. Selector pins lets you easily add an optional 150 selectorized weight to further challenge yourself during your workouts. The Body-Solid Powerline Home Gym (PHG1000X) measures 61 x 38 x 84 inches (L x W x H). And is backed by the Powerline 10 Year In Home Warranty.Amazon.comDesigned to fit into any room in your home or office, the PHG1000X Single Stack Gym provides a versatile, total body work out. Measuring 84 by 61 by 38 inches assembled, the PHG1000X offers a multiple station design in an economically sized footprint. The PHG1000X features a patented press arm system that functions as a chest press station and at the same time replicates the pectoral dumbbell fly. Coming complete with a lat bar, a straight bar, and a utility strap, the PHG1000X offers numerous high pulley, low pulley, and leg extension/ leg curl exercises. Take your workouts to a higher level by adding an optional 150-pound selectorized weight stack. The easy selector pin saves time and energy and still allows you to add standard weight plates when you want even great challenge. Built to last, the PHG1000X carries a 10-year frame warranty and a one-year parts warranty from Powerline.Features and Specifications:User capacity: one User capacity: one Assembled dimensions: 84 by 61 by x 38 inches Assembled dimensions: 84 by 61 by x 38 inches Included accessories: lat bar, straight bar, utility strap Included accessories: lat bar, straight bar, utility strap Chest press station Chest press station Lat pulldown/high pulley Lat pulldown/high pulley Seated row with low pulley Seated row with low pulley Leg extension/leg curl Leg extension/leg curl Pectoral fly station Pectoral fly station Optional weight stack: 150-pound selectorized weight stack and/or plate load weight stack (both sold separately Optional weight stack: 150-pound selectorized weight stack and/or plate load weight stack (both sold separately 10-year frame warranty 10-year frame warranty One-year parts warranty One-year parts warranty
